LanguageData.SinkHole.label: sinkhole
LanguageData.SinkHole.description: A sinkhole into a vast cave network... It worries you to think what may be down there, you can hear movement far beneath the earth when listening closely... You might want to collapse the hole with explosives to ensure it stays down there.
LanguageData.HorrorHive.label: horror hive
LanguageData.HorrorHive.description: A horrid nest full of god knows...
LanguageData.HorrorDen.label: horror den
LanguageData.HorrorDen.description: A large den housing something terrible no-doubt.
LanguageData.HorrorBurrow.label: burrow
LanguageData.HorrorBurrow.description: A burrow containing... Hopefully nothing... Best not get too close to it.
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisVisceral.label: horror crysalis
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisVisceral.description: A cacoon that protects a molting Terrorworm
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisProwler.label: horror crysalis
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisProwler.description: A cacoon that protects a molting Terrorworm
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisBulwark.label: horror crysalis
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisBulwark.description: A cacoon that protects a molting Terrorworm
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisSpitter.label: horror crysalis
LanguageData.HorrorCrysalisSpitter.description: A cacoon that protects a molting Terrorworm
LanguageData.HorrorFirefoamPod.label: glowing pustule
LanguageData.HorrorFirefoamPod.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.
LanguageData.MaggotNest.label: mite nest
LanguageData.MaggotNest.description: A bugmidden and mite nest, primary food source for Horrors.
